name: Brave 0.27.3
notes: Final Muon Release. Get the NEW Brave at https://brave.com/download

name: Brave 0.25.304
notes: Added information for migrating to the new Brave browser. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.25.304dev

name: Brave 0.25.2
notes: Fixed several security issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.25.2dev

name: Brave 0.24.0
notes: Fixed several about:blank tab issues, swipe navigation on macOS. Updated to Chromium 69.0.3497.100 and Tor 0.3.4 series. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.24.0dev

name: Brave 0.23.105
notes: Fixed Windows crash and issues with extensions (LastPass, Bitwarden, and DashLane). More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.105dev

name: Brave 0.23.104
notes: Added support for window.prompt and fixed several security issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.104dev

name: Brave 0.23.79
notes: Fixed crash when discarding tabs. Improved fingerprinting protection. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.79dev

name: Brave 0.23.77
notes: Fixed several critical security issues and crashes. Updated to Chromium 68.0.3440.84. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.77dev

name: Brave 0.23.73
notes: Fixed extension popup appearing transparent on first click and several Tor crashes. Updated to Chromium 68.0.3440.75. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.73dev

name: Brave 0.23.39
notes: Added Tor Private Tab keyboard shortcut and fixed several Tor issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.39dev

name: Brave 0.23.31
notes: Fixed Twitch streams not playing, added IndexedDB support, updated to Chromium 67.0.3396.103. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.31dev

name: Brave 0.23.19
notes: Added Tor support for Private Browsing, new toolbar icons and styling refinements, EasyPrivacy tracking list and several ad-block performance improvements. Fixed several copy and paste issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.23.19dev

name: Brave 0.22.810
notes: Fixed CAPTCHA compatibility with Windows scaling (high-res monitors) and several other Brave Payments improvements. Upgraded to Chromium 67.0.3396.71. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.810dev

name: Brave 0.22.727
notes: Added CAPTCHA verification when accepting grants, added new preferences (Clear Payment Data, Clear Payment History, and Delete Wallet). Optimized contributions by adding support for batch voting and several other Brave Payments improvements. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.727dev

name: Brave 0.22.721
notes: Fixed tab rendering and unresponsiveness, fixed security indicator when toggling shield on some sites, fixed crash for extension background pages, fixed torrent download when extension disabled. Upgraded to Chromium 66.0.3359.170. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.721dev

name: Brave 0.22.714
notes: Improved browser performance (especially with a high number of tabs open), several improvements for Brave Payments. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.714dev

name: Brave 0.22.669
notes: Fixed crash when submitting online forms, several bugs on macOS (updates not always working, trying to use Brave when no windows are open). Several Brave Payment improvements. Upgraded to Chromium 66.0.3359.117. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.669dev

name: Brave 0.22.22
notes: Fixed missing static variable on macOS for first-run referral program installs. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.22dev

name: Brave 0.22.21
notes: Improvements to the referral program and reverted quarantine feature for macOS. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.21dev

name: Brave 0.22.13
notes: Fix printing on Windows, scrolling issues, several Payments issues, tab discarding, dialog fixes, Google cookie mismatch when importing, several tab style issues, and IME fixes for international users. Added EV Certificate status, U2F support for various websites, and a new look for preview tabs. Optimized opening new windows. Upgraded to Chromium 65.0.3325.181. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.22.13dev

name: Brave 0.21.24
notes: Fixed possible error when trying to save password, bugs with ledger session corruption and other bug fixes. Upgraded to Chromium 65.0.3325.162. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.21.24dev

name: Brave 0.21.18
notes: Added the ability to pay Twitch publishers with BAT. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.21.18dev

name: Brave 0.20.46
notes: Fixed YouTube videos lagging while playing, back and refresh buttons not working after long usage and general performance improvements. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.20.46dev

name: Brave 0.20.42
notes: Fixed websites being unpinned under Brave Payments. Fixed copying and pasting images, and fixed several keyboard shortcut issues. Upgraded to Chromium 64.0.3282.140. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.20.42dev

name: Brave 0.20.30
notes: Fixed restoring tabs at startup causing slow performance. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.20.30dev

name: Brave 0.20.29
notes: Major performance optimizations, third-party fingerprinting protection option added and enabled as default, 2-finger swipe navigation for macOS, encrypted cookies, and hundreds of other fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.20.29dev

name: Brave 0.19.147
notes: Fixed several issues with crash reporting. Upgraded to Chromium 64.0.3282.119. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.147dev

name: Brave 0.19.139
notes: Fixed wallet recovery keys being corrupted when restarting browser, recovering wallets using cross-OS recovery keys and YouTube publishers appearing as URLs under Payments screen. Upgraded to Chromium 64.0.3282.85. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.139dev

name: Brave 0.19.134
notes: Fixed backup key corruption when restoring wallets, muted media being autoplayed and several password management improvements. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.134dev

name: Brave 0.19.131
notes: Added Strict Site Isolation mode, disabled password autofill during page loads, improvements to both Brave Payments and autoplay. Upgraded to Chromium 63.0.3239.132. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.131dev

name: Brave 0.19.123
notes: Fixed vulnerability in WebTorrent. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.123dev

name: Brave 0.19.122
notes: Fixed DuckDuckGo referral code for private search. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.122dev

name: Brave 0.19.116
notes: Added the ability to use DuckDuckGo as a separate default search engine for private tabs. Fixed several Payments issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.116dev

name: Brave 0.19.105
notes: Fixed several issues when opening and closing tabs, payment improvements. Optimized fingerprint tracking. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.105dev

name: Brave 0.19.95
notes: Added the ability to pay YouTube publishers with BAT, fixed several issues, and upgraded to Chromium 62.0.3202.94. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.95dev

name: Brave 0.19.88
notes: Fixed ctrl-shift-tab keyboard navigation and several Brave Payments issues. Upgraded to Chromium 62.0.3202.89. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.88dev

name: Brave 0.19.80
notes: Added multi language spell check. Fixed several BAT Payments issues. Upgraded to Chromium 62.0.3202.75. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.80dev

name: Brave 0.19.70
notes: Fixed several issues with BAT payments and upgraded to Chromium 62. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.70dev

name: Brave 0.19.53
notes: Added support for MetaMask, notification when detecting a Dapp, several BAT (Mercury) fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.53dev

name: Brave 0.19.48
notes: Launched Brave Payments with BAT (Mercury), import passwords, several optimization improvements, and Bitwarden password manager. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.19.48dev

name: Brave 0.18.36
notes: Added MacBook trackpad pinch to zoom gesture support. Upgraded to Chromium 61. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.18.36dev

name: Brave 0.18.29
notes: Fixed Netflix by adding VMP support, optimized page loads and fixed tab behaviour (detaching, moving and dead tabs). More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.18.29dev

name: Brave 0.18.23
notes: Fixed many issues with performance (browser and video freezing, lag on find bar), Fixed tab loss on crash, fixed spell check on Disqus comment boxes, and upgraded Chromium. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.18.23dev

name: Brave 0.18.14
notes: Added a welcome screen for first time users, added an option to disable 'Top Sites' in autocomplete, fixed URL display on error pages, and numerous fixes for Sync, extensions, and performance. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.18.14dev

name: Brave 0.17.19
notes: Numerous performance improvements, fixed tab display when closing tabs, fixed history listings and fixed a security issue for WebTorrent. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.17.19dev

name: Brave 0.17.16
notes: Fixed sync issues, fixed a URL bar issue, and upgraded Chromium to 59.0.3071.115. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.17.16dev

name: Brave 0.17.13
notes: Added the Honey extension, added a wide URL bar option, performance fixes, updated to Chromium 59.0.3071.109. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.17.13dev

name: Brave 0.17.3
notes: Improvements to sync, various fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.17.3dev

name: Brave 0.17.1
notes: NOTE: This is a preview build. Added Honey extension, compact bravery panel, bitward password manager, and new welcome screen. Many perf, style, and build fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.17.1dev.

name: Brave 0.16.9
notes: Hotfix for crash on login or other input. Fixed ability to scroll to latest bookmark as well. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.16.9dev

name: Brave 0.16.6
notes: Added various performance improvements, fixed bookmark manager drag & drop for folders and bookmarks, and upgraded to Chromium 59.0.3071.86. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.16.6dev

name: Brave 0.15.314
notes: Hotfix for latest release which fixes password updates, popups for logins, and autocomplete search terms. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.15.314dev

name: Brave 0.15.310
notes: We've made incredible performance improvements, added sharing to social media sites & email, added option to enable/disable HTML5 autoplay, added ability to zoom for UI elements, and fixed various UI issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.15.310dev

name: Brave 0.15.1
notes: Hotfix to alleviate crashes due to PDF loading or visiting particular sites. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.15.1dev

name: Brave 0.15.0
notes: Added tear-off tabs, Widevine for Amazon, an easy to use extensions preference pane, and a lot of fixes. Upgraded to Chromium 58.0.3029.81. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.15.0dev

name: Brave 0.14.1
notes: Fixed a copy and paste issue, fixed the lion badge position, and improved security. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.14.1dev

name: Brave 0.14.0
notes: Added ability to see SSL certificates, added 100 tabs per tab set, added lion icon badge, fixed keyboard shortcuts, fixed YouTube ad blocking, and fixed many other issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.14.0dev

name: Brave 0.13.5
notes: Added sync between computers, suppressible per-tab alert and confirm message dialogs, preference page for plugins, fixed wallet recovery, and fixed various UI issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.13.5dev

name: Brave 0.13.4
notes: Hotfix for a crash which could happen when loading an invalid URL. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.13.4dev

name: Brave 0.13.3
notes: Added export for bookmarks, added new background images, fixed rapid tab switching, and many under-the-hood enhancements including Chromium 56.0.2924.87. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.13.3dev

name: Brave 0.13.2
notes: Added import recovery keys for Brave Wallet, fixed spellcheck on Linux, and fixed numerous UI and Wallet issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.13.2dev

name: Brave 0.13.1
notes: Hotfix for Widevine on Windows and memory related crash. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.13.1dev

name: Brave 0.13.0
notes: Added WebTorrent support. Added nicer payment history statements. Fixed blocking of YouTube ads. Fixed performance on tab switching. Fixed various UI issues.  More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.13.0dev

name: Brave 0.12.15
notes: Join community.brave.com for help and feature requests. Added Yandex, Qwant, and Semantic Scholar search engines. Various fixes and updates. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.15dev

name: Brave 0.12.14
notes: Hotfix to address a certificate expiration issue. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.14dev

notes: Hotfix to address URL bar usability issues and security update. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.13dev

notes: Hotfix to address a security issue. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.12dev

name: Brave 0.12.11
notes: Hotfix to address a security issue. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.11dev

name: Brave 0.12.10
notes: Added dropdown menu with options for new tab. Fixed various issues for the new tab page, Brave Payments, and UI fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.10dev

name: Brave 0.12.9
notes: Added a new tab page, added Wolfram Alpha and Infogalactic search engines. Fixed various UI, bookmark, and address bar issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.9dev

name: Brave 0.12.8
notes: Added Pocket extension, fixed numerous issues for bookmarks manager and findbar, and fixed crashes for a few sites. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.8dev

name: Brave 0.12.7
notes: Added Google Widevine for Netflix support. Added Startpage search engine. Fixed autocomplete, bookmark management, and a couple security issues. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.7dev

name: Brave 0.12.6
notes: Ability to set default browser on startup and in preferences, URL bar fixes, error page reloading fixes, and much more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.6dev

name: Brave 0.12.5
notes: Added Brave Wallet backup and recovery, fixed numerous issues for bookmarks manager, and much more. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.5dev

name: Brave 0.12.4
notes: Added support for regional adblocking in about:adblock, Bravery panel for private tabs, Windows scrolling fixes and much more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.4dev

name: Brave 0.12.3
notes: Added importing from other browsers. Added extension enhancements including auto-update, post-install downloads. Various fixes for Brave Payments, geolocation, toolbar, autofill, history, address bar, and per-site settings. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.12.3dev

name: Brave 0.12.1
notes: Added many languages. Added extension UI. Various fixes for Brave Payments, history, and password manager extensions. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.12.1dev

name: Brave 0.12.0
notes: Added option to allow for mixed-content. Added shortcut to view source. Various fixes for autofill, bookmarks, and history. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.12.0dev

name: Brave 0.11.6
notes: Added the ability to pay publishers with the Brave Ledger. Added autofill, bookmarks enhancements, find bar design update, and history. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/0.11.6dev

name: Brave 0.11.5
notes: Stability and minor bug fixes. More details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.5dev

name: Brave 0.11.4
notes: More data clearing options, tab page previews, printing fix on Windows, memory leak fixes, crash fixes and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.4dev

name: Brave 0.11.3
notes: PDF, zoom, URL bar fixes, and libchromiumcontent 52.0.2743.116. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.3dev

name: Brave 0.11.2
notes: Long tap history on back button, search shortcuts like 'yt cat videos', tab and nav cloning,  and much more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.2dev

name: Brave 0.11.1
notes: PDF viewing, more data clearing options, navigator.registerProtocolHandler support, copy image option and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.1dev

name: Brave 0.11.0
notes: LastPass support, WebRTC fingerprinting protection, Flash click to play if Flash is enabled, and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.11.0dev

notes: Autocomplete, new suggestions UX, experimental Flash support and more: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/v0.10.4dev

notes: Crash fix for Windows with some link types.

notes: Fingerprint protection in the Bravery panel and various fixes. Full notes: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/v0.10.1dev

name: Brave 0.10.0
notes: Per site Bravery panel, error pages, and much more. Full detail: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.10.0dev

notes: Chromium 50.0.2661.102 and various bug fixes. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.6dev

notes: Spell check, script blocking similar to NoScript, and much more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.5dev

name: Brave 0.9.4
notes: Startup fix if profile dir does not exist

name: Brave 0.9.3
notes: Dashlane support, external protocol handling, permission prompts, Chromium 50.0.2661.86, and more

name: Brave 0.9.2
notes: Windows 32-bit support, Windows default browser handling, fingerprinting protection, zoom fixes, multi language support, printing fix, and more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.2dev

notes: 1Password support, malware protection, phishing protection and more.  Details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.9.0dev

name: Brave 0.8.3
notes: Downloads manager, downloads toolbar, passwords manager, and more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.3dev

notes: Password saving, single instance app, more HTTPS Everywhere info, full screen mode fixes, and more.  More details here: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.2dev

name: Brave 0.8.1
notes: Security updates, basic HTTP auth support, and more. Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.1dev

name: Brave 0.8.0
notes: Bookmark management, bookmark importing, history for url bar, permissions dialogs and lots more.  Full details https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.8.0dev

notes: Various fixes and optimizations, full notes here: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.16dev

name: Brave 0.7.14
notes: Added security sandbox for content processes, various UI perf optimizations, bug fixes, and more. Full details:  https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.14dev

name: Brave 0.7.13
notes: Preferences tab added, third party cookie blocking and referrer blocking, various keyboard shortcuts added, context menu fixes, 2 finger swipe navigation for OSX. and much more. Full release notes: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.13dev

name: Brave 0.7.12
notes: Various crash fixes and window.opener fixes, various keyboard shortcut fixes, and much more. Full release notes here: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.12dev

notes: Fixed a security issue, added Windows shortcuts, fixed site loading problems, and a lot more.  Full details: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases

name: Brave 0.7.10
notes: Added hamburger menu, fixed Windows packaging issues, Windows black window problem, and fixed various in-content problems.   Release notes: https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.10dev

name: Brave 0.7.9
notes: UI tweaks, adblock bug fix, left and right nav keyboard shortcuts, and better privacy. Full details at https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.9dev

notes: New UI, various features, and various fixes. Full details at https://github.com/brave/browser-laptop/releases/tag/v0.7.8

notes: Fixed load time indicator and Windows menus

name: Brave 0.7.6
notes: Turning blocking ads off, now also turns off insertions.  Fix for no updates available on Windows. Toggle bookmarks fix.

name: Brave 0.7.5
notes: Fix link navigation sometimes not working, Facebook login fix, fix a case of adblock/TP/https-everywhere not working, fix for auto update UI appearing for background checks.

name: Brave 0.7.4
notes: Enable / disable https everywhere, adblock, and tracking protection from the menus.

name: Brave 0.7.3
notes: Added UI for checking updates, downloading updates, no updates, release notes, and errors.  Removed some bad auto-suggest URLs (not all bad ones yet).

notes: Clicking on links when we are the default browser now works, more fixes for multi window filtering

name: Brave 0.7.1
notes: Possible fix for websites not loading, fix for undoing closed tabs from session store, menu fixes
Popup window fixes, new update UI, HTTPS Everywhere fixes, more menu work.

notes: Tab previews and loading indicators per tab
